messages.title: Vote Conservative
messages.content: For 5 Years of Energy and Ideas

messages.title: 5 More Years of Gordon Brown?
messages.content: Do you want to wake up the morning after the General Election and discover that Gordon Brown will be the Prime Minister for another five years? No, I thought not.

messages.title: A New Team
messages.content: A New Team at the top with fresh and principled ideas. A New Team that is desperate to put patients back at the heart of the NHS, not managers driven by targets. A New Team with reforms education policy in a way which means every child will receive an education you can only get after you pay for it. A New Team which promises to gain moral ground we have today, which is a big state and small people, and make the state small and realise it is that more big.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure the children of Armed Forces heroes get a proper education and free university places for children of troops killed in action.
Freeze council tax for two years.
Give the public the chance to buy cheap shares in state-owned banks like Royal Bank of Scotland.
Scrap Labour plans to fund old folks’ care with a "death tax" and cut disability pay.
Cut duty on petrol when prices at the pump go up - and raise it when prices fall.
Guarantee that patients will be able to see a GP from their local clinic between 8am and 8pm, seven days a week.
A massive 400,000 new training places to help young people get a start in employment.
Cut the number of MPs by 10% and reduce Ministers pay.
Cut the number of officials who can demand entry to our homes.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Liberal Democrat = a vote for Labour. Get Gordon Brown out. Vote Conservative.

issues.health: A New Team that is desperate to put patients back at the heart of the NHS, not managers driven by targets.

quotes.text: I took billions from pensions VOTE FOR ME
I doubled the national debt VOTE FOR ME
I let 80,000 criminals out early VOTE FOR ME
